name: OpenGoat
description: Expose OpenGoat CLI through OpenClaw as an alternative execution path.

command.label: OpenGoat Command
command.help: Executable path or command name used to launch OpenGoat.

baseArgs.label: Base CLI Arguments
baseArgs.help: Arguments prepended to every forwarded OpenGoat invocation.

cwd.label: Working Directory
cwd.help: Optional working directory for OpenGoat command execution.

env.label: Environment Overrides
env.help: String map merged into process environment for OpenGoat runs.
